item.description: Couldn't make it to the Reason Rally and American Atheist Convention in March? Come to our next meeting for a recap of the rally on the big screen. Richard Dawkins, Adam Savage, Tim Minchin, Penn Jilette and more. Following the clips we will have an open discussion about the rally and what it means for the future of the Secular movement in America.
item.name: Reason Rally Recap
